mapper.select: select book_code, title, author, img ,code from(select rownum r, book_code, title, author, img ,code from(select book_code, title, author, img,code from book b, book_category c where b.category_code=c.code order by dbms_random.value)) where r between 1 and 5

select book_code, title, author, img,code from(select rownum r, book_code, title, author, img,code from(select book_code, title, author, img,code from book b, book_category c where b.category_code=c.code order by dbms_random.value)) where r between 1 and 5

select book_code, title, author, rating, img, code from (select rownum r, book_code, title, author, rating, img, code from (select b.book_code, b.title, b.author, b.rating, b.img , bc.code from book b, book_category bc where (b.category_code(+)=bc.code) and b.rating=5 order by b.book_code)) where r between 1 and 5

select book_code, title, author, rating, img, code from (select rownum r, book_code, title, author, rating, img, code from (select b.book_code, b.title, b.author, b.rating, b.img , bc.code from book b, book_category bc, purchase p where (b.category_code=bc.code) and(p.book_code=b.book_code) order by p.pay_date desc)) where r between 1 and 5

select book_code, title, author, rating, img,code from(select rownum r, book_code, title, author, rating, img,code from(select book_code, title, author, rating, img,code from book b, book_category c where b.category_code=c.code order by pub_date desc)) where r between 1 and 5
select num, subject from(select rownum r, num, subject from(select num, subject from notice order by w_day desc)) where r between 1 and 7
select num, subject from(select rownum r, num, subject from(select num, subject from inquiry order by w_day desc)) where r between 1 and 5

select b.pub_date,b.sale_price,b.rental_price, b.book_code, b.img, b.title, b.author, b.company, b.intro, b.rating, bc.name, b.sale_class, b.sale_state,bc.code from book b, book_category bc where (b.category_code=bc.code) and to_char(b.input_date,'month')= to_char(sysdate, 'month') and to_char(b.input_date,'year')= to_char(sysdate, 'year') order by pub_date desc

select book_code, title, img, author, sale_price, rental_price, sale_class, sale_state,code from(select rownum r, book_code, title, img, author, sale_price, rental_price, sale_class, sale_state,code from(select distinct b.book_code, b.title, b.img, b.author, b.sale_price, b.rental_price, b.sale_class, b.sale_state, bc.code from book b, book_category bc where b.category_code =bc.code and rating=5 and (b.input_date between to_char( sysdate-( (to_char(sysdate,'D')) -2 ), 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) and to_char( sysdate-( (to_char(sysdate,'D')) -2 )+4, 'yyyy-mm-dd' )) order by rating desc)) where r between 1 and 20

select book_code, title, img, author, sale_price, rental_price, sale_class, sale_state, pub_date,code from(select rownum r, book_code, title, img, author, sale_price, rental_price, sale_class, sale_state, pub_date,code from(select distinct book_code, title, img, author, sale_price, rental_price, sale_class, sale_state, pub_date,code from book b, book_category bc where b.category_code =bc.code and rating=5 and trunc(input_date,'mm')=trunc(sysdate,'mm') order by rating desc)) where r between 1 and 20
